law.catch_line: A dealer or other person may not transport a regulated firearm into the State for the purpose of unl...

text.section: A dealer or other person may not transport a regulated firearm into the State for the purpose of unlawfully selling or trafficking of the regulated firearm.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 10 years or a fine not exceeding $25,000 or both.
Each violation of this section is a separate crime.
